comment: Idk what the candidates will do , but I hope Bernie , Tulsi , and Yang supporters band together into a coalition . We all want the same thing , an outsider .
amr:

                        :ARG0 (a / and
                              :op1 (p / person

                                          :op1 "Bernie"))
                              :op2 (p2 / person
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Tulsi"))
                              :op3 (p3 / person
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Yang"))
                              :ARG0-of (s / support-01))
                        :ARG1 (c3 / coalition)

      :snt2 (w / want-01

comment: The only way this will happen is if Tulsi and yang drop out and immediately endorse Bernie and join him on the campaign trail as we approach the final stretch before Iowa .
